A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A surprisingly clever continuation of the star wars saga. For me personally it might be the best handcrafted movie in the series. Sure it is a divisive film\, and of course taste is subjective\, but the fan score on this site reflects childish acts by entitled children rather than the quality of the movie. My choice of giving it topp score comes down to my personal taste\, but 40 percent is just dumb and objectivly wrong.
